name: Hoop Stack Color: Sort Puzzle
description:
Hoop Stack is a simple yet challenging game that can keep you hooked for hours. This game is a updated version of puzzle game, which is highly addictive, and great to play in your free time.
You can have a fun time while training your brain and level up your IQ.
HOW TO PLAY
- Sort colorful hoops to make a unify-colored columns of hoops
- Simply tap and move colorful hoops to stack them up
- Hoops can only be stacked on top of hoops of the same color
- Strategize every move, and think carefully to master this fun puzzle game
FEATURES
- Hoop Stack Color is featured with bright and colorful 3D hoops
- Soothing and relaxing sound effect that will release your stress
- Available offline, no Wifi needed
- Hundreds of levels to challenge your mind
- No time limit, you can play at anytime you want
- Great puzzle game for all ages
Enjoy the metal challenges with this fun Hoop Stack Puzzle
